verses.text: Axo ix yilan winhaj Jacob to van sja winhaj Esaú yet' 400 svinac, ix spojanek' eb' unin winh t'a skal eb' ix ix, aton ix Lea yet' ix Raquel yet' pax eb' ix chavanh scriada eb' ix.
Ha eb' ix criada chi', ix b'ab'laj b'at eb' ix yet' yune' chi'. Ichato chi' ix b'at ix Lea yet' eb' yico'. Tzak'anto ix b'at ix Raquel yet' winhaj José.
D'a elanhchamel ix b'ab'lajb'at winhaj Jacob t'a yichanh eb' ix. Uquel ix em nhojnaj winh masanto ix k'och winh t'a yichanh winh yuk'tac chi'.
Ix javi lemnaj winhaj Esaú chi', ix och lak'naj winh t'a sjaj winh yuk'tac chi', ix och tz'ub'naj winh t'a sti' winh, ix ok' eb' winh schavanhil.

Ixlajwi chi' ix yilanoch eb' ix ix yet' eb' unin winhaj Esaú chi', ix sk'anb'an winh icha tik: --Ha juntzanh eb' tik, ¿mach ay yic eb'? xchi winh. --Vuninal eb', ix yak' Dios t'ayin yuj swach'k'olal, xchi winhaj Jacob chi'.
Ichato chi' ix snitzancot sb'a eb' ix criada yet' eb' yune' t'a yichanh winhaj Esaú chi', ix em nhojan eb' t'a sat lu'um.
Ix snitzanpaxcot sb'a ix Lea yet' eb' yune', ix empax nhojan eb'. Tzak'anto ix javi winhaj José yet' ix snun, aton ix Raquel, ix empax nhojan eb'.

Ix sk'anb'an winhaj Esaú t'a winhaj Jacob chi' icha tik: --¿Tas tza na t'a yib'anh juntzanh nok' nok' ix in cha t'a yol b'e? xchi winh. --Ic yaj nok' smasanil yic tz'och junk'olal t'a co cal, xchi winhaj Jacob chi'.
--Maay vuk'tac, te tzijtum pax nok' vico', canocab' nok' ed'oc, xchi winh.

Palta ix och ijan winhaj Jacob chi' yalan t'a winh icha tik: --Maay vuk'tac, tato wach' in t'a ichanh, cha juntzanh silab' svak' tik t'ayach, icha val to ha Dios svilochi ayic tzach vilan tik, yujto t'a wach'k'olalil ix in a cha'a.

Tzin tevi t'ayach to tza cha juntzanh silab' ix vik'cot t'ayach, yujto ha Dios ix el t'a sk'ol yak'an in b'eyumal tik, malaj jab'oc tas syak' palta t'ayin, xchi winhaj Jacob chi'. Ix ochnhej tean winh t'a winh yuk'tac chi', yuj chi' ix scha nok' silab' chi' winh.
Ix yalan winhaj Esaú chi' icha tik: --Ha ticnaic, coyec. Ha in tzin b'ab'laj t'a eyichanh, xchi winh.

Ix tak'vi winhaj Jacob chi': --Ach vuk'tac, ojtac to a eb' unin, k'un sk'unb'i eb', tzin naanpax yuj nok' calnel yet' nok' vacax nenetacto yune', tato tzin pech nok' ay smay junnhej k'ual scham nok' smasanil.
Yuj chi' wach' tzach b'ab'laj vuuj. Ha inxo tik, k'ojank'olalnhej ol in b'atoc, icha syal sb'ey eb' unin yet' nok' nok' tik. Olxo ach vilk'och t'a Seir, xchi winh.

--Yik'ocab' icha tzal chi'. Syal skan jayvanhoc eb' winh in checab' tik yic skolwaj ed'oc, xchi winhaj Esaú chi'. Palta ix yalan winhaj Jacob chi' icha tik: --Maay, yuj val dios, manh ak' pensar vuuj, xchi winh.
Ha t'a jun k'u chi', ix meltzaj winhaj Esaú t'a lum Seir.

Axo winhaj Jacob, ix jacan winh t'a jun ak'lic. Ata' ix sb'o spat winh, ix sb'oanpax juntzanh yunetac lechpat winh b'aj ix och nok' smolb'etzal nok'. Yuj chi' Sucot ix yak' winh sb'iej jun lugar chi'.
Ayic ix paxta winhaj Jacob t'a Padán-aram masanto ix javi winh t'a yol yic Canaán, malaj tas ix ik'an winh, wach' sk'ol winh ix jaxi. Ix sb'oan scampamento winh t'a yichanhb'at chonhab' Siquem.
100 q'uen plata ix yak' winh yic smanan jun lum lum chi' winh t'a eb' yuninal winhaj Hamor, winh ix ik'anel yich chonhab' Siquem. Ata' ix sb'oq'ue scampamento winh.
Ixlajwi chi' ix sb'oanq'ue jun altar winh, El-Elohe-Israel ix yak' winh sb'iej.
